TECHNIQUE.name: Time settings
TECHNIQUE.DESCRIPTION: Configure system clock (automatic updates via NTP, time zone, ...)

INPUT.NAME: CLOCK_FQDNNTP
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: NTP server list uses DNS domain names instead of IP addresses?
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: This should be enabled if a DNS domain name is used as an NTP server instead of an IP address. It is for Windows compatibility.

INPUT.NAME: CLOCK_NTPSERVERS
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: List of NTP time servers to use

SELECT1.NAME: CLOCK_TIMEZONE
SELECT1.LONGDESCRIPTION: This City's Timezone will be used to set the standard on each node.

INPUT.NAME: CLOCK_TIMEZONE_CUSTOM
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Custom timezone via String. Used only if dropdown is set to "Custom via Textbox"!
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: See http://www.unicode.org/cldr/charts/latest/supplemental/zone_tzid.html Column TZID for valid Timezones

INPUT.NAME: CLOCK_HWSYNC_ENABLE
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Synchronize the system clock periodically with the hardware clock
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: Save the system clock to the hardware clock periodically. Can cause problems with Xen DomU's!

INPUT.NAME: CLOCK_SYNCSCHED
INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Set hardware clock from system clock every (minutes)
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: This is the time to wait between each synchronisation of the system clock to the the hardware clock.
